Package com.giift.sdk.io.retailer

This package contains all the interfaces with the server for the retailer (/pos) api.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Pos  
    Pos.CardSendEmail
    Server request, to email card details to card owner
    Pos.Check
    Server request, that will update on the GiiftProvider the requested card.
    Pos.Create
    Server request, that will create user and a card for the user
    Pos.DmoFetch
    Server request, that will update on the GiiftProvider the dmos associated to a specific retailerDmo
    Pos.History
    Server request, that will update on the GiiftProvider the transaction history of a card
    Pos.Language
    Server request, that will update on the GiiftProvider the content associated to a retailer (e.g Privacy policy / Terms & Conditions and insert/update
    Pos.Logout
    Server request to Logout retailer
    Pos.Physical  
    Pos.TransactionSendEmail
    Server request, to email card details to card owner
    Pos.TransactionService
    Server request, that will to Add / Redeem / Refund credit of a card
    Utils
    Method to return base Uri for the Pos

Package com.giift.sdk.io.retailer Description

This package contains all the interfaces with the server for the retailer (/pos) api.
